EmailTemplate.subject: Don’t lose your spot at Forum 2023
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
July 18 – 19, 2023 | Boston, MA Prepare to be inspired Join us <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content&utm_term&utm_campaign=HEVT-202307-xSEG-FRM-FORUM-REGISTRATION&utm_campaign_id=]]>—and hundreds of others who are changing the healthcare experience—at Forum 2023. As our guest, there’s no cost for you to attend our in-person event in Boston for two days of content focused on the transformative power of virtual care. • Explore timely topics including virtual nursing, health equity, clinical quality, the patient experience and more • Hear directly from leaders on the critical role of virtual care. See full list of speakers here <[[https://forum.teladochealth.com/speakers?utm_source=marketo&utm_medium=email&utm_content&utm_term&utm_campaign=HEVT-202307-xSEG-FRM-FORUM-REGISTRATION&utm_campaign_id=]]>. Featured speakers: Howard Rubin Chief Information Officer
Evara Health Vipul Bhatia, MD Associate Chief Medical Officer for Post-Acute and Continuing Care Services
WellSpan Health Judd Hollander, MD Senior Vice President, Healthcare Delivery Innovation Thomas Jefferson University About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
